caption.p: MIC values of Norfloxacin (Nor) ( A) and Ethidium Bromide (EtBr) ( B) against S. aureus K2068 ( mepA) in absence or presence of the essential oil from the leaves of P. caldense (EOPC) or Chlorpromazine (CPZ). Each result represents the geometric mean of three simultaneous experiments. (***) Statistically significant values ( p < 0.0001)
